name: Dashboard Notepads
author: Johan Ström

sections.description:
Add up to 3 notepads to the Dashboard. Great for messages, html and ideas between admins and developers on your WordPress Site.
Read more on how to use Dashboard Notepads in the FAQ.

New in version 1.2

  • Each notepad is now an individual widget.
  • User view/edit settings for each pad
  • Configuration on each widget directly.
  • Configuration page can disable WordPress widgets.

Features:

  • Dashboard Widgetized
  • Up to 3 different notepads as individual widgets.
  • Disable other widgets (optional).
  • HTML support for view mode.
  • Raw CSS customization.
sections.installation:
1. Upload dashboard-notes to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How do I use this plug-in?

Once installed you’ll find the notepads on your Dashboard.

Where is the settings panel?

Click your Dashboard in the main admin left menu and you’ll find it among other Dashboard plugins you might have.
